stimulusHtml: Which of the following best explains why the religious revival of the late eighteenth century is seen as consistent with the development of Romanticism?

features.html: The following question refers to the topic of Romanticism.

choicesHtml: They both rejected the Enlightenment emphasis on empiricism and Enlightenment beliefs that nature was knowable and predictable.
They both rejected emotional experiences in favor of dispassionate analysis.
They both advocated a return to the organized religious structure and doctrines of the Roman Catholic Church.
They both advocated the use of violence if necessary to create a shared national community.
